price: 108. Nabii Muusa isi gaba Kamiisik moyya как culta ikkek culussu heeh hadiffi tet heeh, edde luk too waqdi is tet yable marat Qidih ifak Raqqa itte, Baras Aalle kalah, firqawnah Asta takkemkeh.
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
